content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > show off your finished washcloth and > other crochet projects in the sweet > bee crochet facebook community click > here to join 1 this quick and beautiful cotton washcloth works up with a lovely texture using the suzette stitch and half_double_crochet if the suzette stitch is new to you a tutorial is included within the pattern use your favourite worsted weight cotton yarn and 4mm hook to crochet this eye catching washcloth that s perfect for gift giving or using within your own home ***inside the pattern you will find *** * detailed written instructions * clear photos * special stitch tutorial with a link to a detailed walkthrough * required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** * approximately 119 yards of worsted weight cotton yarn i used wecrochet dishie colourways seen in photos are inlet and lilac mist * 4mm hook * yarn needle * scissors * measuring tape *this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products * 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
